General.Name: Rosseti Tsentr I Privolzh’ye PAO
General.Description: Public Joint stock company Rosseti Centre and Volga region, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the transmission and distribution of electricity in Russia. It supplies electricity transmission and technological connection services to electric grids located in Vladimir, Ivanovo, Kaluga, Kirov, Nizhny Novgorod, Ryazan, and Tula regions, as well as in the Republic of Mary El and the Republic of Udmurtia. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Public Joint stock company Rosseti Centre and Volga region is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.
